permissions: Admins can update broker certification types. Non-admins can update broker certification types when they have update permission on the broker.
side_effects: Updates a broker certification type record.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --broker or --certification-type must be provided. If provided, those flags must be non-empty. The certification type must belong to the broker.

flags.name: --broker
flags.validation: If provided, must be non-empty. Example: 456.

flags.name: --certification-type
flags.validation: If provided, must be non-empty. Example: 789.
